definition: abstain from certain food (as when ill)/avoid certain foods/be on a diet
to be jealous of/fear/dread/scruple/to avoid or abstain from/to quit/to give up sth
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: The doctor is dieting me severely.
Epilepsy patients who have any taboos on eating it?
sentences.chinese: 癫痫病患者在饮食上有什么忌口呢？

sentences.english: Are there any foods or beverages I cannot have while in treatment?
sentences.chinese: 治疗中有什么食物或饮料我需要忌口的？

sentences.english: If your blain blain is flush, the doctor can suggest your avoid certain food, do not eat acrimony .
sentences.chinese: 如果你的痘痘泛滥，医生都会建议你忌口，别吃辛辣。

sentences.english: Are you on a special diet, sir?
sentences.chinese: 您有特别忌口的食物吗？

definition: to follow the doctor's advice/as instructed by the physician
to fast/to abstain from eating/to forbid the eating of (certain foods)/a fast
to save food/to go on a diet
tonic food (food considered to be particularly healthful)/to eat such foods
to recur (of a disease)/to reappear/to relapse (into a former bad state)
